      • waitAndClickElementLocated

        protected void waitAndClickElementLocated(org.openqa.selenium.By by)
                                   throws org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException
        Waits for a while to the element to be appear, and then clicks it. When operating web applications using WebDriver, UI on web applications do not always change immediately after certain user event; there might be some time lug, thus using this method instead of simple WebDriver#click is recommended.
        Parameters:
        by - locator to determine which element to click
        Throws:
        org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException - when the specified element don't become visible for given time.
